distinct
from t_ys
order by ${orderByClause}
sql.insert: insert into t_ys (id, ys_type, ys_name, ys_subname, item_name, item_year, item_type, item_buy_way, item_tax, item_cur_amount, item_next_amount, item_own_user, item_input_datetime, item_input_user, isvalid ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ysType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ysSubname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemBuyWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemTax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemCurAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemNextAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemOwnUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemInputDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{itemInputUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvalid,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

ys_type = #{ysType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ys_name = #{ysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
